document_data.mainbody:
he Kahmirs were one of four major crime families operating in Calimshan in 1370 DR. Until the Darkstalker Wars in 1359 DR, they were the most powerful of all Calishite underworld groups since the Seventh Age of Calimshan.
The four major crime families of Calimshan in 1370 DR
* El Pesarkhal
* El Kahmir
* El Vyndahla
* El Ahimar
